user_query: I'm a music blogger and I'm working on an article about the greatest Latin artists of all time. Can you provide me with the details of the top hot Latin songs artists and their popular tracks? Also, fetch the lyrics for their songs.

TaskList.description: Fetch the data for the top hot Latin artists including their names and details.
Once the artist data is fetched, retrieve the popular tracks for each of the top hot Latin artists.
After obtaining the popular tracks, fetch the lyrics for each of these songs.
